Completed

The Lore:

Started learning programming in college with the C++ and python language as the entry point.
Found an interest in the art of programming and I wanted to do more about this amazing skill.
I Started learning more about other languages such as C# and LUA then later got introduced to web development.
I instantly knew that this might be my ticket into tech and I started learning the fundamentals of web development: .HTML, .CSS, and more importantly JavaScript as the main focus. Later then PHP and MySQL became my back-end choice.
Was intrigued about app development and wanted to delve more into subject. Laravel became the main choice framework in making that journey a lot quicker.
I later then switched and focused more of my attention in the front-end as my apps looked rather stiff and boring.
Played around with canvas and later, web transitions, gsap and three.js and much much more.
So far the journey is still early, but I am learning more on each passing day.

All of my works are on display at my github and some are visually displayed at the work section of this site that you can access.
